data.persona: I guess I shouldn't have thrown those two blokes overboard.  I'm going to end up with a slit throat if I go to jail.  I wonder how much I could get for the Dutchess' brooch?
data.description:
You are in the Jail room.
Stark and dank, the jail cell is tiny and scary. It has no windows and just had solid stone walls on all sides. There is no bed, and only a small metal bucket to take care of needs.
There's a food tray, a small metal bucket, a blanket, a metal bucket, a wall, a window with metal bars, and a metal meal tray here.
The spider and the jailer are here.

You are carrying a bag of herbs, wearing a knife, and wielding a rock.

data.short_motivation: I need to make myself look sad and pathetic in hopes that the jailer will take pity on me.
data.mid_motivation: I want to be let out of this jail cell.
data.long_motivation: I want to stay alive, and the longer I stay in this jail the more likely it is that someone will come and have my throat slit.

timeline.label: 2 hours ago
timeline.action: drop "the two blokes" off the side of a ship.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: go the jail once we arrived back in port.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: use the menthol extract from the bag of herbs with my eyes to make it look like I'm crying.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: drop the knife I'm holding to show the jailer I mean no harm.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: follow the jailer out of the jail.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: go the next town over so I can evade any other jailers for a while.
